name: Goblin Commander: Unleash the Horde
synopsis: Goblin Commander: Unleash the Horde calls upon your skill and courage to destroy the enemy, pillage the enclaves, and scorch the earth. With a horde of specialized goblin warriors at your command, you can wage war in single-player and multiplayer modes. Design a custom army from over 25 different goblins with melee, ranged, elemental, acid, and magical combat specialties. You can even take direct control of giant titans, powerful turrets, and battle-ready vehicles to cause reckless mayhem across the lands.
